name: @37N: KEEP. HIM. ALIVE.
description:
@73N is an old friend of yours, a steam-powered robot fallen on hard times. Feed him the wood he needs to keep his fires going. Then build the parts he needs in order to fix himself. 

There's just one problem. The parts he needs are complicated. And you may just find yourself building a whole factory in order to put them together.

CONTROLS:

You can use your keyboard if you've got one, or multitouch if you're on your phone or something.

  • Arrow keys to move.
  • Z: pick up things, or drop if appropriate.
  • X: drop things, or pick up if appropriate.

MIGHT NOT RUN IN SAFARI

This game is in the style of Infinifactory and Factorio, though of course streamlined for a weekend jam. I started out intending to make a combo game but ran out of time. Three cheers for the Jam!

This is the post-Jam version. If you're rating games for the Jam please play the original Jam release.
